item.title: 特朗普政府对阻止解除美联储理事库克职务的裁决提出上诉
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府周三迅速采取行动，对联邦法官暂时阻止特朗普采取史无前例的措施解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的裁决提出上诉。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Wednesday moved quickly to appeal a federal judge's ruling temporarily blocking Trump from taking the unprecedented step of firing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook.】

item.title: Bumble传记片《Swiped》挑战硅谷 "男孩俱乐部
item.description: 由英国演员莉莉-詹姆斯（Lily James）饰演约会应用 Bumble 创始人惠特尼-沃尔夫-赫德（Whitney Wolfe Herd）的新传记片《Swiped》，将观众带回了 2010 年代初的硅谷，那时左右滑动还与相亲没有任何关系。【原文：The new biopic "Swiped," starring British actor Lily James as dating app Bumble founder Whitney Wolfe Herd, takes the audience back to Silicon Valley in the early 2010s, before swiping left or right had anything to do with match-making.】

item.title: 默克将撤销伦敦药物研究中心
item.description: 默克公司周三表示，将取消在伦敦的研究业务，理由是英国的商业环境充满挑战。【原文：Merck said on Wednesday it was scrapping research operations in London, citing the UK's challenging business environment.】

item.title: 人工智能软件开发商 Replit 以 30 亿美元估值融资 2.5 亿美元
item.description: 随着投资者继续支持人工智能初创企业，人工智能软件开发平台 Replit 周三表示，它已在一轮融资中筹集了 2.5 亿美元，该公司总部位于旧金山，估值达 30 亿美元。【原文：AI software developer platform Replit on Wednesday said it has raised $250 million in a funding round that values the San Francisco-based company at $3 billion, as investors continue to back AI startups.】

item.title: 巴里克公司高管在黄金争端中改换门庭，为马里总统出谋划策
item.description: 一位矿业部官员周三告诉路透社，在与马里政府的紧张谈判中代表巴里克矿业公司的一位高级管理人员已改换门庭，成为马里总统的顾问。【原文：A senior Barrick Mining executive who had been representing the company in tense negotiations with Mali's government has switched sides to become an adviser to Mali's president, a mines ministry official told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 甲骨文因人工智能云计算收益而暴涨，埃里森逼近马斯克成为世界首富
item.description: 甲骨文公司周三股价大涨约43%，创下历史新高，有望加入万亿美元精英俱乐部，此前该公司展示了其作为主要人工智能云提供商的崛起。【原文：Oracle shares surged about 43% to a record high on Wednesday, putting the company on track to join the elite trillion‑dollar club, after it showcased its rise as a major AI cloud provider.】

item.title: IIF 称，新兴市场投资组合 8 月份流入近 450 亿美元，但裂缝正在显现
item.description: 据一家银行业贸易集团的报告称，8 月份投资者向新兴市场股票和债券投资组合投入了近 450 亿美元，创下近一年来的最高纪录，但中国以外的新兴市场股票出现大量资金外流，表明投资者的情绪发生了变化。【原文：Investors plowed nearly $45 billion into their emerging market equities and debt portfolios in August, the most in nearly a year, but a large outflow from EM stocks outside of China pointed to a change of sentiment among investors, according to a report from a banking trade group.】

item.title: 劳工部监察长审查对 BLS 经济数据收集工作的质疑
item.description: 美国劳工部总监察长办公室周三表示，继近期大幅下调非农就业数据和削减通胀数据收集后，该办公室正着手审查美国劳工统计局（BLS）在收集和报告美国经济数据方面所面临的挑战。【原文：The office of the Labor Department's inspector general said on Wednesday it was initiating a review of challenges the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) faces in collecting and reporting U.S. economic data following recent large downward revisions to nonfarm payrolls and cuts to inflation data collection.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-莫洛尼被任命为美国证券交易委员会公司金融部主任
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）在周三的一份声明中表示，该机构已任命长期从事公司证券业务的律师、前美国证券交易委员会官员詹姆斯-莫洛尼（James Moloney）领导其公司金融部门。【原文：James Moloney, a long-time corporate securities lawyer and former official at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, has been tapped to lead its corporation finance division, the agency said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲人工智能代表 Klarna 为聊天机器人踩刹车
item.description: Klarna 首席执行官塞巴斯蒂安-西米亚特考夫斯基（Sebastian Siemiatkowski）表示，在成为欧洲人工智能的早期采用者之一后，这家贷款公司在利用人工智能技术削减成本时可能走得太远，牺牲了服务和产品的改进。【原文：After becoming one of the early adopters in Europe of artificial intelligence, Klarna CEO Sebastian Siemiatkowski says the lender may have gone too far in using the technology to cut costs at the expense of service and product improvement.】

item.title: 欧盟不太可能应特朗普要求对印度和中国加征关税
item.description: 欧盟消息人士称，欧盟不太可能像美国总统唐纳德-特朗普敦促欧盟那样，对俄罗斯石油的主要买家印度或中国征收严厉的关税。【原文：The European Union is very unlikely to impose crippling tariffs on India or China, the main buyers of Russian oil, as U.S. President Donald Trump has urged the bloc to do, EU sources said.】

item.title: 美国银行研究所：人工智能需求激增，美国数据中心建设创纪录
item.description: 美国银行研究所的一份报告显示，随着科技巨头继续向人工智能基础设施投入数十亿美元，美国数据中心的建设支出在 6 月份达到了 400 亿美元的历史新高（按季节性调整后年率计算）。【原文：Construction spending on U.S. data centers reached an all-time high of $40 billion at a seasonally adjusted annual rate in June, as technology giants continue pouring billions into AI infrastructure, according to a Bank of America Institute report.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Moelis 从 Jefferies 聘请了资深科技银行家 Timothy Roepke
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Moelis 已从 Jefferies 聘请了资深技术银行家 Timothy Roepke，这家精品投资银行将继续扩大其技术并购专营权。【原文：Moelis has hired veteran technology banker Timothy Roepke from Jefferies as the boutique investment bank continues to expand its technology M&A franchise, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 爱迪生公司旨在以灵活的液化天然气供应替代部分管道天然气
item.description: 意大利燃气和电力公用事业公司爱迪生（Edison）首席执行官周三表示，该公司计划用液化天然气替代管道合同中的部分天然气量，以便在管理需求方面获得更大的灵活性。【原文：Italian gas and electric utility Edison plans to replace some gas volumes from pipeline contracts with liquefied natural gas to gain more flexibility in managing demand, its CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国生物燃料计划将重新分配一半或更少的豁免混合配额
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，白宫正在考虑一项计划，要求大型炼油厂承担最近免除的小型炼油厂生物燃料掺混要求的一半或更少。【原文：The White House is considering a plan that would require large oil refineries to cover around half or less of the biofuel blending requirements recently waived for smaller facilities, according to three sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利联席总裁认为交易前景大幅改善
item.description: 摩根士丹利联席总裁丹-西姆科维茨（Dan Simkowitz）周二表示，交易前景出现了 "戏剧性的改善"，这不仅是与关税波动冻结讨论的那几个月相比，而是考虑到十年中更长的时期。【原文：Morgan Stanley co-president Dan Simkowitz said on Tuesday there is "dramatic improvement" on the deals outlook, not just compared with the months where tariff volatility froze discussions, but considering a longer period in the decade.】

item.title: Synopsys 因中国业务困境股价下跌，2025 年收益将化为乌有
item.description: 由于中美贸易紧张局势损害了 Synopsys 的季度收入，并让投资者对其中国业务的未来产生了疑虑，该公司股价周三下跌了近 35%，抹去了这家芯片设计软件提供商 2025 年的涨幅。【原文：Shares of Synopsys fell nearly 35% on Wednesday, erasing the chip design software provider's 2025 gains, as Sino-U.S. trade tensions hurt its quarterly revenue and left investors mulling the future of its China business.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，亚马逊正在开发可与 Meta 相媲美的消费级 AR 眼镜
item.description: 据 The Information 周三援引两位知情人士的话报道，亚马逊公司正在开发面向消费者的增强现实（AR）眼镜，此举将使该公司与 Facebook 所有者 Meta .【原文：Amazon.com is developing augmented reality (AR) glasses for consumers, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing two people with knowledge of the plans, a move that would put the company in competition with Facebook owner Meta .】

item.title: 消息人士称，贝莱德领导的集团正在商谈为阿美交易筹集约 103 亿美元资金
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士告诉路透社，由贝莱德全球基础设施合作伙伴公司（BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners）牵头的一组投资者正在与贷款方谈判，为阿美石油公司（Aramco）的 Jafurah 基础设施交易争取高达 103 亿美元的融资。【原文：A group of investors led by BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners is in talks with lenders to secure up to $10.3 billion in financing for Aramco's Jafurah infrastructure deal, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司宣布向 Avelo 航空公司订购 50 架 E195-E2 喷气式飞机
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周三表示，该公司已与廉价航空公司 Avelo Airlines 就巴西飞机制造商的 E195-E2 喷气式飞机达成了 50 架确定订单和另外 50 架购买权的协议，这是该公司在美国达成的首笔飞机交易。【原文：Embraer said on Wednesday it has reached a deal for 50 firm orders and purchase rights for another 50 with budget carrier Avelo Airlines for the Brazilian planemaker’s E195-E2 jets, in the company’s first U.S. deal for the plane.】

item.title: 消息人士：雪佛龙参与希腊近海天然气勘探招标
item.description: 希腊能源部长斯塔夫罗斯-帕帕斯塔夫鲁（Stavros Papastavrou）周三表示，美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司已提交一份标书，与希腊希腊能源公司联合勘探希腊近海四个区块的天然气。【原文：U.S. oil major Chevron has submitted a bid to explore for natural gas in four blocks offshore Greece in a consortium with Greece's Hellenic Energy , Greece's Energy Minister Stavros Papastavrou said on Wednesday.】

item.title: JBS 首席执行官称中国代表团将访问巴西禽流感疫情重灾区
item.description: 一个中国代表团预计将访问巴西南部的南里奥格兰德州（Rio Grande do Sul），该州在 5 月份爆发了禽流感疫情，这使人们对巴西可能很快恢复向其最大买家出售家禽产品产生了希望。【原文：A Chinese delegation is expected to visit the southern Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul which was hit by a bird flu outbreak in May, raising hopes Brazil may resume selling poultry products to its top buyer soon.】

item.title: 投资者对财政部 30 年期债券拍卖持谨慎态度，近期拍卖结果令人失望
item.description: 投资者对美国财政部周四出售 220 亿美元 30 年期债券持谨慎态度，因为上个月的拍卖结果令人失望，其中一些需求指标是 2025 年以来最弱的，不过有些人认为这次可能会有所不同。【原文：Investors are cautiously approaching the U.S. Treasury's sale of $22 billion in 30-year bonds on Thursday after an underwhelming auction last month that had some of the weakest demand metrics of 2025, though some believe it could be different this time.】

item.title: 美国参议员克鲁兹提议取消人工智能 "沙盒 "监管
item.description: 美国共和党参议员泰德-克鲁兹（Ted Cruz）周三提出了一项法案，允许人工智能公司申请联邦监管豁免，以帮助他们尝试开发新技术。【原文：Republican U.S. Senator Ted Cruz introduced a bill on Wednesday that would let artificial intelligence companies apply for exemptions to federal regulation to help them experiment in developing new technology.】

item.title: 美国 7 月批发库存修正后有所下降
item.description: 7 月份美国批发库存的增幅略低于最初的预期，这表明企业在第二季度库存消耗殆尽后并未急于重建库存。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories increased a bit less than initially thought in July, suggesting businesses were not rushing to rebuild inventory after stocks were depleted in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国能源部长称，特朗普优先考虑结束乌克兰战争而非制裁俄罗斯液化天然气
item.description: 当被问及美国将如何应对中国购买受制裁的俄罗斯液化天然气货物时，美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的首要任务是结束俄乌战争，避免出现更大的混乱。【原文：U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright said President Donald Trump's priority is to bring the Russia-Ukraine war to an end, without larger disruptions, when asked how the U.S. would react to Chinese purchases of sanctioned Russian LNG cargoes.】

item.title: 法雷奥首席执行官支持汽车中最低欧盟含量以提高地区竞争力
item.description: 法国汽车零部件供应商法雷奥公司（Valeo）首席执行官克里斯托夫-佩里亚特（Christophe Perillat）周三表示，在欧盟销售的汽车中引入欧洲含量最低要求对于保持该地区汽车行业的竞争力至关重要。【原文：Introducing a minimum requirement for European content in cars sold in the EU is vital for keeping the region's auto sector competitive, Christophe Perillat, chief executive of French car parts supplier Valeo , said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 古巴国家电力公司称古巴电网崩溃
item.description: 古巴国营电力公司周三表示，共产主义古巴国家电网在不到一年的时间里第四次崩溃。【原文：Communist Cuba's national power grid collapsed for the fourth time in less than a year, the state run power company said Wednesday.】

item.title: 比特币买家暴跌，投资者对加密货币的欣喜消退
item.description: 随着投资者对加密货币的狂热消退，积累和囤积比特币和其他加密货币的公司股价大幅下跌。【原文：Companies that accumulate and hoard bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies have suffered sharp drops in their share prices as the crypto euphoria that has gripped investors recedes.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空在竞争对手 Spirit 的主要枢纽扩展服务
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周三表示，该公司将在竞争对手精神航空公司的主要市场佛罗里达州劳德代尔堡（Fort Lauderdale）拓展服务，新开九条直飞航线，横跨美国、拉丁美洲和加勒比海地区。【原文：JetBlue Airways said on Wednesday that it will expand its service in rival Spirit Airlines' main market of Fort Lauderdale, Florida, with nine new nonstop routes across the United States, Latin America and the Caribbean.】
